item.description:
[THIS EVENT WAS POSTED A WHILE BACK, BUT I'M AFRAID THE GROUP EMAIL NEVER WENT OUT!! I APOLOGIZE FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE!]

Rebecca Emberley has graciously opened up her home in Kittery, ME to host a Holiday Gathering!

Please RSVP and let us know what you'd like to contribute to the food or beverages.

This will be our first social gathering for our North-of-Boston LOA Group! Looking forward to it. Thanks so much, Rebecca, for your hospitality!

Note: Address will be emailed to those who RSVP Yes a few days prior to the event.

Tricia

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Holiday Gathering for North-of-Boston LOA Meetup Group
